EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Max, It can happen…I have seen it before. Did you see my two other emails (attached.) They are stating that your rate is 50 per hour not 65… Sara From: Max Katz [mailto:max.katz.work@gmail.com] Sent: Friday, July 20, 2012 4:34 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Fwd: Payments to Max Katz Sara, You ever hear of US mail taking longer than three days to arrive? -Max ---------- Forwarded message ---------- From: Irena Mozetich <finance@calvingroups.com <mailto:finance@calvingroups.com>> Date: Fri, Jul 20, 2012 at 1:32 PM Subject: Re: Payments to Max Katz To: Max Katz <max.katz.work@gmail.com <mailto:max.katz.work@gmail.com>>
Hi Max,
First, sorry about the empty email. I hit the wrong button.
So I put one check in the mailbox on Monday and one on Wednesday. I sent them on the address Sara gave me MBO Partners, Inc PO Box 823673 Philadelphia, PA 19182-3673
check# 1005 and 1008.
IrenaOn Fri, Jul 20, 2012 at 1:08 PM, Max Katz <max.katz.work@gmail.com <mailto:max.katz.work@gmail.com>> wrote:Irena, I still have not received any payments from Calvin Group. Can you forward me the check numbers and amounts you sent and the address you mailed them to?
-Max
-- Best Regards,- - - Irena Mozetich | Finance Officer | Calvin Group w : 310.287.2400 <tel:310.287.2400> x304 f : 310.287.1226 <tel:310.287.1226> http://www.calvingroups.com/ <http://www.calvingroups.com/>.*NOTICE: this electronic mail (including any attachments) may contain information that is privileged, confidential, and/or otherwise protected from disclosure to anyone other than its intended recipient(s). Any dissemination or use of this electronic mail or its contents (including any attachments) by persons other than the intended recipient(s) is strictly prohibited. If you have received this message in error, please notify us immediately by reply e-mail so that we may correct our internal records.
